metadata.title: CVE-2022-35653 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A reflected XSS issue was identified in the LTI module of Moodle. Thevulnerability exists due to insufficient sanitization of user-supplied datain the LTI module. A remote attacker can trick the victim to follow aspecially crafted link and execute arbitrary HTML and script code in user'sbrowser in context of vulnerable website to steal potentially sensitiveinformation, change appearance of the web page, can perform phishing anddrive-by-download attacks. This vulnerability does not impact authenticatedusers.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
